result.html: Amárach an Mháirt nach eaTomorrow is Tuesday, isn't it?
result.ponchtml: Amáraċ an Ṁáirt naċ eaTomorrow is Tuesday, isn't it?

result.html: Bliain fhada ab ea éit was a long year.
result.ponchtml: Bliain ḟada ab ea éit was a long year.

result.html: Buile marfach ab ea éIt was a lethal blow.

result.eng: He is a very nice person.
result.html: Duine an-deas is ea éHe is a very nice person.
result.ponchtml: Duine an-deas is ea éHe is a very nice person.

result.eng: The less money they have the better.
result.ga: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearr
result.orig: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearr
result.html: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearrThe less money they have the better.
result.ponchtml: Dá laġad airgead atá acu is ea is fearrThe less money they have the better.

result.eng: The more words you use the better.
result.ga: Dá liacht focal a úsáideann tú is ea is fearr
result.orig: Dá liacht focal a úsáideann tú is ea is fearr
result.html: Dá liacht focal a úsáideann tú is ea is fearrThe more words you use the better.
result.ponchtml: Dá liaċt focal a úsáideann tú is ea is fearrThe more words you use the better.

result.eng: The bigger it is the better.
result.ga: Dá mhéad é is ea is fearr
result.orig: Dá mhéad é is ea is fearr
result.html: Dá mhéad é is ea is fearrThe bigger it is the better.
result.ponchtml: Dá ṁéad é is ea is fearrThe bigger it is the better.

result.html: An Ceanadach tú - Is eaAre you Canadian? - Yes.
result.ponchtml: An Ceanadaċ tú - Is eaAre you Canadian? - Yes.

result.html: An Gearmánach tú - Ní heaAre you German? No.
result.ponchtml: An Gearmánaċ tú - Ní heaAre you German? No.

result.eng: It is a big cause for hope for the future.
result.ga: An-údar dóchais don dtodhchaí is ea é

result.eng: He was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.
result.ga: Éireannach ab ea é a bhí ina chónaí i Meiriceá le fada
